duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect, analyze and synthesize information relating to the country’s health system environment.
Support operationalization of country strategies and translate priorities into concrete activities.
Work with country teams to align existing projects and budgets to new strategic priorities.
Craft concept notes, project proposals and investment cases to mobilize additional funding.
Conduct analytical work to build the evidence base for specific innovative approaches or interventions.
Document and package the learnings from innovative work to help us tell the story in a compelling way.
Develop materials and approaches to effectively build capabilities within PSI in areas of health systems strengthening.

education_certification.credential: Graduate degree in Health Economics, Health Financing, Public Health or a related field (Master's preferred)
